level.heading: Rulemaking authority.
level.text: The Mayor, pursuant to title 1 of the District of Columbia Administrative Procedures Act, approved October 21, 1968 (82 Stat. 1204; D.C. Code § 2-501 et seq.), shall issue rules to implement the provisions of § 1-307.03, § 1-307.05, and this section.

level.heading: Emergency Legislation
level.text: For temporary (90-day) addition of section, see § 2204 of the Service Improvement and Fiscal Year 2000 Budget Support Emergency Act of 1999 (D.C. Act 13-110, July 28, 1999, 46 DCR 6320).

level.heading: Delegation of Authority
level.text: Delegation of Authority Pursuant to D.C. Law 13-38, the Medical Assistance Expansion Program Act of 1999, see Mayor's Order 2001-83, June 7, 2001 (48 DCR 5839).
